body:
Hi Marija,


If you use the default "red" "green" and "blue" functions for rfunc,  
gfunc, and bfunc, you will get a bilinear interpolation by default.   
It may not look very nice, though, as bilinear interpolations tend to  
show "mach band" artifacts.  A simpler approach would be to convert  
your data into a low-resolution image then upsample it with pfilt.   
The conversion can be done using pvalue.


-Greg
